proposals.widgets module¶

class proposals.widgets.SelectMultipleUser(attrs=None, choices=())[source]¶

Bases: django.forms.widgets.Select

Custom widget to allow LDAP users to be entered through Select2.

allow_multiple_selected = True¶

media¶
value_from_datadict(data, files, name)[source]¶

Given a dictionary of data and this widget’s name, returns the value of this widget. Returns None if it’s not provided.
